actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to prvide that, in the case of any individual who dies while in active service as a member of the Armed Sevices as a result of disease, wounds, or injury incurred as a result of a hostile action outside the United States, any Federal income tax liability of such person with respect to the year of such persons death shall not apply.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from Federal income taxes members of the armed forces who die as a result of hostile action outside the United States.

titles.title: A bill to prvide that, in the case of any individual who dies while in active service as a member of the Armed Sevices as a result of disease, wounds, or injury incurred as a result of a hostile action outside the United States, any Federal income tax liability of such person with respect to the year of such persons death shall not apply.
